Description:
Stylish Family Residence With Large Work Shed!
Occupying approx. 720m2, every inch of this family residence will astound! The quality interiors exude on-trend style, while vehicle access to the rear work shed will impress tradies!
Ideally positioned in a quiet cul de sac, this location places you footsteps away from the Bellarine Rail Trail. Leopold Primary School and the Leopold Community Hub are within close reach, along with the Gateway Plaza and local sporting grounds. The Portarlington Highway grants easy access to the delights of both Geelong and the Bellarine Peninsula.
Approx. five years old, youll love that this home feels brand sparkling new. High, square-set ceilings enhance the sleek interiors, along with porcelain floor tiles and tall doorframes. The open plan living/dining/kitchen zone creates a central retreat for the whole family to enjoy, while opening onto the sheltered alfresco for effortless entertaining options. The family room is ideal for children and teens, while the front lounge provides a calming spot to kick back and relax. The kitchen will impress cooking enthusiasts with stone benchtops, an expansive walk-in pantry, and SMEG stainless steel appliances (dishwasher and 900mm oven, gas hob, rangehood). The smoked mirror splashback makes a stylish statement.
Overlooking the front garden, the spacious Master Bedroom creates a private oasis for parents. The walk-in robe is wonderfully spacious, while the large en suite is graced with a large shower, dual vanity with stone benchtops, and separate toilet. Three additional bedrooms with built-in robes share close access to the elegant main bathroom and separate toilet. The study features a built-in desk, while the large laundry boasts ample storage and external access. Ducted heating and evaporative cooling keep you comfortable in all seasons.
Soaking up the northern sunlight, the backyard creates a secure play space for children and pets alike. The oversized remote double lock-up garage features internal access, plus a tall roller door and rear roller door for caravan access. A driveway connects the front garage to the powered work shed, which features two roller doors for additional vehicle storage.
Putting every element in place for an exceptional family lifestyle, youll need to act swiftly to secure this sensational home! Inspect ASAP!

Description:
BELLARINE PENINSULA
This superb 31.5 ha (78 acre) rural property boasts magnificent sea views and represents a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to make it yours.
Much of the preliminary work has been done and the sale includes detailed plans for a magnificent family residence that takes full advantage of the stunning and uninterrupted views across Port Phillip Bay to the Melbourne CBD, Queenscliff and out to Bass Strait.
Zoned farming, with power connected and no predetermined building envelope; other features include a newly formed drive to the home site and two dams. The property is suited to a range of agricultural pursuits including beef, cropping, viticulture or a stud animal operation.
Expressions of Interest closing 27th March 2020.

Address: 3 Corio Bay Court Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
Outstanding home with panoramic bay views
This is Clifton Springs at its spectacular best. A very appealing contemporary family home and established garden, set on an acre of land, and with priceless panoramic views of Corio Bay.
A semi-circular drive delivers you to the covered entrance where you're greeted by the first of two master bedrooms - complete with walk-in robe and smart ensuite. Adjacent is a cosy study or home office. Next is a light-filled lounge with a raked ceiling, an open gas log fire, and those special views through a double-glazed wall of windows. In parallel are two more bedrooms, a bathroom, a laundry and a separate WC.
A superb open-plan kitchen/dining/lounge with a high-gabled ceiling is the central living space. Double glass doors open from the lounge to a covered paved terrace that takes advantage of the brilliant bay vista. The kitchen presents Caesarstone benchtops, Bosch appliances, and generous cupboards, while the intimate dining alcove has views on three sides.
Stairs lead to the prized second master bedroom, with a sparkling ensuite and a private balcony. Other features include a double lock-up garage, a second entertainment terrace, and a large lawn area with the potential for a separate B&B, or granny flat (STCA). Ducted gas heating and two split systems provide year-round comfort.
- Contemporary home and garden with spectacular bay views
- 4 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, 2 lounges, kitchen, dining, study
- 2 master BRs with ensuites - upstairs has private balcony
- Kitchen with Caesarstone benches and Bosch appliances
- Double lock-up garage, ducted heating, two split systems
- Potential for B&B or granny flat on lawn area (STCA).

Description:
Views for less than 1/2 a million dollars
Imagine sitting at the dining table with your morning cuppa enjoying the views of Corio Bay & the City of Geelong. A stunning front rose garden in full bloom enhances the street appeal of this neat & tidy home. This three bedroom family home would make an ideal start for the first homebuyer or investor.
Formal entry opening up to a spacious separate lounge with large light filled windows.
Kitchen with U-shaped bench & dining room with amazing bay views towards Geelong.
All three bedrooms are of a comfortable size.
Central bathroom with bath, separate shower & vanity.
A wide driveway with a high carport allows easy access to the yard.
A large stand alone double garage a the rear of the property would ideally suit a boat & a caravan.
A delightful raised backyard has plenty of lawn for a dog & the children to play.
End the day watching the sun set over Corio Bay with a glass of wine as the lights of Geelong start to twinkle.

Description:
Spacious home in great location with lots of extras
Phone enquiry code for this property: 3003
This great 4-bedroom home with fully fitted studio/workshop also has a large under-cover entertainment area.
The studio/workshop is fully lined, painted and carpeted, with reverse cycle air conditioning, and a verandah - perfect for the artist or craftsperson, and overlooking the rear garden.
There is an open plan kitchen/meals/living area plus a second lounge when you want to watch a separate show on tv.
There is a large solar panel array (4.5kWh), plus two recently installed solar batteries to save on those power bills, as well as a solar-boosted gas hot-water system.
Another feature is the disability friendly main bathroom and accessible ramp entry to the side.
This home also has:
* a double remote-control garage as well as an additional parking space within the grounds
* two garden sheds and a water tank
* three raised garden beds for the green thumbs
* a master bedroom with ensuite and a walk-in robe
* all other bedrooms with built-ins
* quality floor coverings throughout
* a reverse-cycle air conditioner in the main living area and ducted gas throughout
* a kitchen with a large stainless-steel oven and dishwasher, plus large pantry.
* window tinting throughout and Crimsafe security screens to all external doors
All this and is close to schools, major shops, cafes and good public transport.
If you value space in newer home where everything has been done and the living is easy, then this is a must see home for you.

Description:
Affordable, Liveable And Full Of Potential
The Feel:
Enjoying a convenient location nearby to the Drysdale town centre for all social and practical requirements, this two bedroom cottage is ready for its next chapter. Perfectly liveable as is, an ideal renovation project or investment property with future subdivision potential (STCA), inspection will inspire those looking for an entry point with many options moving forward.
The Facts:
Spacious OP living, meals and kitchen area
Kitchen with 600mm upright gas cooker
Undercover outdoor room for entertaining
Flat, grassy yard with colourful gardens
580m2 (approx) close to the Drysdale township
2BRs with BIRs & share the main bathroom with sep. W.C
Gas heating and ceiling fans throughout
2 x garden sheds accommodate extra storage
An easy walk to the shops and Primary School
Public transport close by for commuters
Potential for future sub-division (STCA)
An ideal entry point or renovation project (STCA)
The Owner Loves.
The short distance to the village centre has been so convenient, with everything you need at close hand. Walking distance to the Primary School is ideal for families also. It really is a great location.

Description:
RAIL TRAIL POSITION ON APP. 703 SQM. FABULOUS HOME !
A great location in the middle of Drysdale and designed for privacy and loads of living, even work from home. The Drysdale village, schools, Lake Lorne and all amenities within easy walking distance. Immediately appealing with a wide entrance through to the open plan living with an excellent kitchen, dining and lounge area which opens to the outside undercover entertaining area. Three queen sized bedrooms, master with WIR and ensuite, other two have BIR'S. The fourth room can be a bedroom or a flexible space for required use, currently another lounge room. Central bathroom, separate powder room and laundry. Upstairs is a large living area for theatre, games and loads of options, another toilet here for convenience. Features include gas log fire, split system, pantry, bamboo flooring, quality fittings and furnishings throughout, lots of storage and so much more to impress. The pool area is just perfect and can be viewed from the outdoor area, relax and enjoy. Big freestanding garage as well with access to back area. This generous home is one of the best and will impress!

Description:
Your Very Own Secret Garden!
Youll be charmed the moment you lay eyes on this one-owner home! The two living zones create a wealth of space for families, while enchanting gardens grace the private backyard!
Set in a quiet pocket of Leopold, youll love living within walking distance to the Ash Road shops and Leopold Kindergarten. The expansive Gateway Plaza leaves you spoilt for choice with shopping and dining options, while local sporting grounds and the Gateway Sanctuary inspire the whole family to venture outdoors. Easy access to public transport, Leopold P.S, and the Leopold Community Centre puts the practical elements in place.
High ceilings enhance the interiors, which are in immaculate condition. With updates over the last few years including new carpet and cooking appliances, its easy to see that this home has been well loved.
The front lounge exudes old world charm with ceiling rosettes, while the open plan living zone flows onto two sheltered alfresco areas creating a seamless indoor-outdoor connection. Surrounded by hedges and leafy gardens, both outdoor spaces create an enticing setting for relaxation.
The generous kitchen is well equipped with a built-in pantry, Miele dishwasher, and stainless steel F&P pyrolytic oven, gas hob, rangehood.
Overlooking the cottage-style front garden, the Master Bedroom creates a calming retreat for parents. The walk-in robe provides ample storage, while the en suite features a shower, single vanity, and toilet.
Three good-sized bedrooms with built-in robes are tucked away in a separate wing, along with the main bathroom, laundry with storage, and separate toilet.
Youll be in comfort all year long thanks to ducted heating and two split-system air conditioners.
Home to established trees and beautiful gardens, the secure backyard provides a leafy oasis for both children and parents to enjoy. The warmer weather will inspire you to relax in the shade with a good book or to even set up a picnic on the lush lawn! The 2100L rainwater tank and veggie/herb garden promote sustainable living.
The remote double lock-up garage features internal access, while a rear roller door provides vehicle access to the backyard - perfect for additional vehicle storage.
Dont miss this opportunity to embrace beautiful family living in a quiet pocket of Leopold! Inspection will delight!

Description:
Timeless Elegance
Offering an impeccable level of craftsmanship and attention to detail. This superior, quality-built family home has unprecedented street appeal in Leopold's exclusive Highland Estate. Positioned on a substantial allotment of 1564m2 approx. The magnificent entry establishes a fine introduction to the quality and grand scale of whats to come, with its flowing floorplan and array of separate zones that cater for every member of the family.
This 4-bedroom premier property features a master suite with full ensuite, separate toilet and large walk through robes. While all remaining bedrooms offer built in robes and serviced by a central bathroom and separate toilet.
An extremely spacious laundry with plenty of storage is conveniently located. Three separate living areas, formal living with ornate open fire place, a formal dining room and casual meals area adjoining the spacious chef's kitchen with an abundance of bench space that will not disappoint.
A true entertainer's home. An enormous outdoor entertaining area. From this point you will be amazed with the enormity of the back yard, featuring an oversized double garage with a workshop and third toilet, additional shedding, a veggie garden and beautiful native plants. This property has provisions for side access to the rear of the home enabling access to possible shedding and space to accommodate additional vehicles/boat or caravan.
All this is conveniently located within close proximity to the expanding Gateway Plaza, Geelong's CBD and the beautiful Bellarine Peninsula. Any inspection is sure to impress. Call to arrange an inspection of this fantastic opportunity.

Description:
Spacious Living in Ideal Locale
If you're looking for the perfect family home without compromising on lifestyle, then don't go past this fabulous single-level home. Offering all the features of a brand-new home without the hassle of building. Presenting a convenient and spacious floorplan including 3 bedrooms plus study, 2 bathrooms and 2 separate living areas, this home is sure to surpass your expectations.
The main bedroom, located toward the back of the home, comprises a large walk in robe and private ensuite, while the remaining bedrooms are generously sized and include built in robes, whilst utilizing a central main bathroom and separate powder room.
The open plan kitchen, living and dining area is the heart of the home and provides plenty of space to entertain family and friends, whilst also having the added space of the second separate living area/ kids retreat. The well-equipped kitchen offers quality stainless-steel appliances, gas cooktop, dishwasher, walk in pantry with an abundance of storage and ample bench space.
Completing the floorplan inside is the study located off the dining, the laundry with external access and the double remote lock up garage with secure internal access. Central gas heating and evaporative cooling keep you feeling comfortable all year round.
Outdoors is sure to impress with an undercover alfresco area containing a spa which can become fully enclosed by café blinds, low maintenance gardens, a garden shed for extra storage and a water tank.
This flowing floor plan and home will be sure to suit any family. Situated only minutes from schools, sport grounds and parks, Leopold's Gateway Shopping precinct and only a short drive to some of the coasts best beaches and Geelong CBD. This is one not to be missed!

Description:
Abundance of Opportunity General Residential Zone
This incredible family home is meticulously kept both inside and out with something to offer even the fussiest of buyers. Set on a huge 1536m2 (approx.) allotment with side gate access to the rear of the property, as well as huge 9mx6.5m garage/workshop and double carport perfect storage for a boat, caravan or trailer.
The home itself offers endless opportunities for a variety of individuals, whether it is a growing family, at home business, or developer. Space is definitely not an issue when it comes to this enormous home. Boasting 4 generous sized bedrooms all comprising robes, 2 bathrooms and two terrific sized separate living areas. It is ideally positioned in a quite court location, close to the expansive Leopold Shopping Centre, and 10minutes from Geelong CBD.
The freshly renovated kitchen features new stainless-steel appliances; dishwasher, wall oven, and gas cooktop, and is decorated in lovely neutral tones, overlooking both the living area and out to the undercover alfresco area perfect for entertaining family and friends. The expansive yard and lawn areas that surround are ideal for kids to kick the footy, pets to play, or to maximize this development opportunity (STCA). Permits being previously obtained for a battle-axe subdivision.
Added extras include split system air-conditioning, gas wall heater, ceiling fans in bedrooms, security system and extra garden shed storage. This home is sure to impress, opportunities like this are very rare, so get in quick as this home will not last.

Description:
Luxury Living In Prime Location
Beaming with elegance and for the buyer who expects quality sophisticated lifestyle, conveniently located close to schools, shops, public transport and sporting facilities is this meticulously cared for family home. With 5 bedrooms, 4 living zones, study, solar heated pool, 2 bathrooms plus powder room, stunning kitchen, bamboo flooring throughout and side access for boat/caravans, this 2 storey home has everything a large or growing family could want and more! Sitting on a generous 657m2 it enjoys commanding views of Geelong and beyond.
A large living room with 2-way gas log fire adjoins the open plan kitchen, dining and living room which is ideal for the entertainer. The kitchen features stone benchtops, 900ml S/S appliances, dishwasher, WIP and easy access to the large laundry. Flowing through sliding doors is the indoor/outdoor barbeque alfresco area adjacent to the solar heated pool. For comfort all year round the home features ducted heating and evaporative cooling. Outside there is a low maintenance garden and grassed area to the side and cubby house/garden shed. Gateway Plaza is within close proximity with cafes, eateries, and big brand stores right at your fingertips. Growing families are taken great care of with Leopold Kindergarten and Leopold Primary School at easy reach, public transport is conveniently close by, while easy access to the Leopold Community Hub, Gateway Sanctuary, and local sporting grounds is an added bonus.
4 living zones
6.6 KW of solar panels
Ducted heating/evaporative cooling
Rent pw $650 approx
657m2

Side access for caravan/boat.

Description:
Ideal first home, downsizer or investment!
Built approximately 8 years ago this neat 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom home with DLUG is tucked away in a fantastic part of Leopold. Close to shops and parkland it will appeal to first home buyers, downsizers or investors. Comprising a neat entry with the master bedroom to the right featuring a built in robe and ensuite with oversized shower recess. To the left is the internal access to the 2 car garage. Moving further into the home is the central hub comprising an open plan kitchen, dining and lounge. Climate control is via central gas heating and split system airconditioning. The remaining 2 bedrooms are located off the kitchen and are serviced by a central bathroom featuring both shower and bath. The laundry is to the rear of the home and has access to the rear of the home where the clothes line is located. The north facing side of the property has a lovely large deck area ideal for relaxing at the end of the day. This really is a fantastic package in a great location with potential for further improvements. An affordable entry into the market or for those who are looking for a break from relentless garden maintenance and looking for a potential "lock up and leave" home. Be quick to inspect this one as it will go quickly!

Situated in a prime location, this well-appointed family home is sure to appeal to those who are searching for space and privacy. Comprising 5 Bedrooms, 2 Bathrooms, 2 living areas and a large back yard, this property certainly has the potential to create something special in one of Geelongs fastest growing suburbs.

Description:
A rare opportunity.
Clifton Springs can only be described as the best valued suburb along the whole of the Bellarine Peninsula. This market is the best chance you will have to secure a wonderful well priced home close to some of the best beaches in Australia. It is well suited for investors, first home buyers and home owners.
Upon entry into this beautiful home you are greeted by the original timber floors that run throughout the living area and a wood fire heater. The kitchen and dining area complement each other well making entertaining a breeze, featuring a built in pantry, gas stove top and electric oven. The property also has 3 well sized bedrooms with the main featuring a walk in robe and an entrance into the bathroom which includes a bath and large single vanity.
Stepping outside you realise how large the block is, totalling 592m2 (approx.), making it the perfect environment for the kids to play or for the dog to run around in. The garage and carport each hold a car space helping you keep your vehicles out of the weather.
The location cannot be beat, Clifton Springs Golf Club, Drysdale Shopping Centre are only a short drive away and with Ocean Grove 15 minutes away trips to the beach will become a common occurrence.
Don't miss out on purchasing in the ever growing Clifton Springs, value for money will not last forever.

Description:
Low Maintenance Living in Ideal Locale
Looking to downsize or for the perfect investment property? A low maintenance, two-bedroom unit, centrally located within close proximity to all of lifes necessities. This property gives you the opportunity to tick all the boxes, with minimum outlay.
Upon entering the unit, you are greeted with the open living, dining and kitchen area offering ample space within the compact footprint. The kitchen comprises wrap around benches, gas cooktop, wall oven and plenty of cupboard space.
Both bedrooms are accessed via the common hallway, both generous in size and offer well-fitted built in robes. The bathroom is spotless, centrally placed to service both rooms, and offers a separate toilet. Further storage options are available in the hallway.
Completing the floorplan inside is a good sized internal laundry with plenty of room for all the appliances and external access. Outside offers a spacious courtyard that wraps around the unit, as well as an undercover alfresco area perfect for entertaining, single remote-controlled garage and further space for at least one other vehicle in the driveway.
Added extras include a Vulcan wall heater, split system air conditioning and ceiling fans in bedrooms. Ideal for permanent living, a downsizer or fantastic rental investment, this one is not to be missed!

Description:
As Neat as a Pin in Ideal Location!
Take note of this brilliant opportunity to secure what could be your new home! Nestled in a well-established pocket of Leopold, sits this charming property that has been meticulously looked after and cared for. Conveniently located within walking distance to the Dorothy Street Shops on substantial allotment of 651m2 approx., you are sure to be impressed.
This residence has been designed with convenience in mind, posing a very comfortable floorplan that offers plenty of space inside and out. Offering three sizable bedrooms all with built in robes, main with private powder room, while remaining bedrooms utilise fully fitted central bathroom.
The updated & fully functional kitchen contains all stainless-steel appliances; wall oven, brand new Dishlex dishwasher, gas stove top and range hood. Offering ample bench space and storage cupboards. Completing the floorplan inside is two separate living areas, perfect for family living, a formal dining room and a sizeable laundry with external access.
This delightful home enjoys the comfort of reverse cycle split systems (x2), a gas heating wall furnace and brand-new window furnishings throughout. Also featuring an undercover carport, a garden shed for extra storage and an outdoor studio/ workshop which has been fully lined and carpeted for the upmost comfort. The generous yard is completely secured with a brand new high front fence providing the upmost security and privacy, and a perfect place for the kids to enjoy!
Within walking distance to local shops, a short drive to local schools and the wonderful Leopold Gateway Plaza, you won't want to pass on this opportunity.
